item.title: Git Bash Display TortoiseGitPlink Fatal Error
item.description: Intro Git bash display fatal error on clone and push project in bash. However, when trying ssh -T git@githut.com will return access successful, that means the SSH configuration is correct {% asset_img image1.png This is an image %} Solution This is due to the default ssh client is overwritted by tortoisegit. There are two methods to solve Method 1 go to tortoisegit -> setting -> network. Change the default ssh client from tortoisegitplink to ssh Method 2 change the enviornment variable GIT_SSH
